snippet: A member of the S.E.C. who had been opposed to a proposal to overhaul the money market fund industry has had a change of heart.
abstract: Money market funds could lose trademark stable value of $1 a share after Luis A Aguilar, critical member of the Securities and Exchange commission, voices his support for controversial efforts to overhaul the $2.6 trillion industry; array of regulators have been pushing to change the structure of money market funds so they are no longer vulnerable to the type of panic that hit one of the most prominent funds in 2008 in a major turning point of the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: A member of the S.E.C. who had been opposed to a proposal to overhaul the money market fund industry has had a change of heart.

headline.seo: Effort to Overhaul Money Market Funds Gains an Ally
headline.main: Bid to Write New Rules for Funds Gains Ally
headline.print_headline: Bid to Write New Rules For Funds Gains Ally
